description: Block codegen of features for DX12 to JSON conversion. (this is just a comment on the current file for human eyes)

ID3D12Resource: Comment: WriteToSubresource is needed because codegen gives pSrcData as the wrong type and because thhe manual signature in the base class defining it doesn't match what correct codegen would produce.

structures: GUID Comment - We can generate the header for the decoded struct but the body needs a manual implementation.
